summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Linden Avenue, in the City of Seattle, from North Forty-second Street to North Fiftieth Street, by constructing water mains therein of proper dimensions and material, together with all gates, tees, crosses, fire hydrants and other appurtenances necessary for the reasonable water service and fire protection of said district, in accordance with Resolution No. 615 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
